==Network Admin &rarr; Users==

The [[Network Admin Users Screen]] controls user management in the network. Users are added on a global basis to the entire network, then assigned to specific sites. 
 
[[Image:superadmin-users.png|640px|Network Admin Users Screen]]


Back to [[Network Admin]] or [[Administration Screens]].

== Users ==

=== Table of Users ===

lists all users on this network.

; Edit
: Click this link to go to the user's profile page.

== Add User ==

Clicking the ''Add User'' button near the top of the screen will open a new screen to add a new user into your network.
